panels.description:
Ratio of Satisfactory vs Intolerable response timing. 1 is good.

Calc uses 300ms as Satisfactory timing, 1200ms as tolerable, with anything longer being intolerable.

(Tolerable must equal 4 x Satisfactory and prometheus metric bucket boundaries must align with this ratio between Satisfactory and Tolerable)

https://medium.com/@tristan_96324/prometheus-apdex-alerting-d17a065e39d0
panels.title: User Experience (Apdex Score)
